metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0400 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was discovered in linux kernel in the smc protocol stack, causing remote dos.

notes.Note: sbeattie> no fix available as of 2023.01.10

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
linux-azure: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
linux-signed package in trusty is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-signed-azure: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
linux-signed-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
